section2-content-1: I'm a software engineer currently based in Salvador - BA (Brazil). I have a passion about what I do and I love to see when users in the real world are positively impacted by some project in which I've worked in!
section2-content-2: Currently I'm a student in the Masters Program in Systems and Products Engineering Program at the Federal Institute of Bahia.
section2-content-3: Professionally, I'm currently working as a Senior Software Engineer at WEX, a North American company that is a provider of payment processing and information management services to the United States commercial and government vehicle fleet industry.
section2-content-4: If you need to talk with me, please reach me out in one of my contacts (below):

section5-portfolio.title: WEX Edge
section5-portfolio.description: I've been working in the WEX EDGE project, which is focused in provide solutions of payment for hotels, fuel, fleet, tires and oter products

section5-portfolio.title: Zap
section5-portfolio.description: It's a tool that leverages WhatsApp API in order to make the contact with other people easier. Using "Zap" we can communicate with people without the need of saving their contacts in our agenda. Click here to use zap.

section5-portfolio.title: EFECSS
section5-portfolio.description: It's a library developed to make the usage of CSS animations easier. There are two versions, the efecss-pure-css, using only CSS and efecss that contains some utilitaries in JavaScript.

section5-portfolio.title: Weskit
section5-portfolio.description: The Web Starter Kit (Weskit) is a tool developed to make the process of landing page creation easier. Currently the Weskit is available in Github.

section5-portfolio.title: Ericsson Revenue Manager
section5-portfolio.description: During my staying at "Ericsson Inovação S. A.", a subsidiary of Ericsson, I've been part of the development team of some modules of the Revenue Manager Project. In january of 2019 I've traveled to Kiev, in Ukraine, to provide on site support about the integration of the modules in which I've worked

section5-portfolio.title: Congresso de Metodologia do Ensino de Línguas (CoMEL)
section5-portfolio.description: I've developed a Landing Page for the first and second Congress of Language Teaching Congress, organized by the Federal Institute of Bahia and other important institutions of Brazil

section5-portfolio.title: Le Parc
section5-portfolio.description: The Le Parc application has several features for residents of the condominium. From visitor control to monitoring information, events and much more! The platform has been developed during the time I've worked at IWWA and it's available in Google Play and App Store

section5-portfolio.title: Gestores VXCase
section5-portfolio.description: The app "Gestores VXCase" has been developed during the time I've worked at VXCase. It has several features to make the work easier for the managers of the company. Considering it's an internal app, it's not available at Google Play Store or App Store.

section5-portfolio.title: AuraBrasil
section5-portfolio.description: The "AuraBrasil" app allows users to see all machinery catalog of the company and also provide some information of their construction in order to find the most appropriate machine to help on that. It has been developed during the time I've worked at IWWA and it's available in the Google Play and App Store

section5-portfolio.title: EducGames
section5-portfolio.description: It has been a Landing Page developed to the project EducGames of the Federal Institute of Bahia (IFBA), that aims to gamify the learning.
